item.title: Empirical Methods of Biomedical Knowledge Graph Construction
item.description: Proposed a new large-scale dataset, BioRel, for distant supervised relation extraction in biomedical domain. The dataset is created by aligning UMLS relations to Metamapped Medline Corpus.

item.title: Distant Supervised Relation Extraction
item.description: Designed separate head-tail CNN to alleviate mislabeling issue in distant supervised relation extraction. Proposed separate head-tail convolution and pooling to extract better semantic features, and classified relation from coarse-to-fine to alleviate impact of Not-A relation instances.

item.title: Relation Extraction from Biomedical Text
item.description: Introduced bootstrapping framework to extract binary relation in biomedical text, which discovered relational facts iteratively using entity pairs as seeds.
